name: Burrowmino
description:
Burrowmino is a game made during the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots" and with the diversifier "Year of the Rabbit".

In this game you are placing burrows of different types and shapes to earn points. To place your tiles, they need to be connected to a root tile or a same type of burrow.

There are 3 families of burrow : Rabbits, Foxes and Badgers. The game ends when you can't place tiles anymore.

Don't forget to comment with your best score! c:

Controls:

Use the Mouse Left Click to place tiles on the grid. 
Use the Spacebar to rotate the tiles.
Hold H to display some help and informations.

Creators:

Thiébaut Alexis : Developper / Game Designer

Comminges William: VFX Artist / Tech artist

Gallardo Eva : Game Designer / 2D Artist

Rivière Maya : 2D Artist / Game Designer

Hoffmann Salomé : 2D Artist

Baumann Florian : Sound Designer / Composer

PATCH NOTES (09/02/2023)


Added features:- More Tiles (and cute animals c: )
- Better tiles Rotation and inputs
Bug Fixes:
- Music will now loop without problems- Add an Endgame screen with Credits
- Adding the missing tutorial
Known Issues: 
- Sometimes the tile rotation won't be applied
- The lack of VFXs and global feedbacks (coming soon!)
